title: The Knight in Rusty Armor
description: Not since Jonathan Livingson Seagull first enthralled the reading public has there been a story that captivated the imagination so thoroughly as The Knight in Rusty Armor.It's a lighthearted tale of a desperate knight in search of his true self. His journey reflects our own--filled with hope and despair, belief and disillusionment, laughter and tears.Anyone who has ever struggled with the meaning of life and love will discover profound wisdom and truth as this delightful fantasy unfolds.The Knight is an experience that will expand your mind, touch your heart, and nourish your soul.
author: Robert    Fisher
